results.name: Run lengths in Golay-Rudin-Shapiro sequence A020985.
comment: a(2*n) = length of n-th run of 1s; a(2*n+1) = length of n-th run of -1s.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
